SELECT m.MEMBER_ID, m.NAME, m.RESIDENT_REGIST_NUM, m.ADDRESS_NUM, m.ADDRESS1, m.ADDRESS2, m.EMAIL, m.PHONE, m.PROFILE_PIC, m.JOIN_DATE, m.RESIGN_DATE, m.PASSWD, m.USE_YN, m.CREATE_DATE, m.UPDATE_DATE,
m.SALARY, bank.BANK_NAME AS BANK_NAME, m.ACCOUNT, m.ACCOUNT_HOLDER, m.CERTIFICATE, m.EDUCATION, dept.CODE_NAME AS DEPT_NAME, grade.CODE_NAME AS GRADE_NAME, m.AUTHORITY FROM MEMBER m LEFT JOIN COMMON_CODE dept ON m.DEPT_ID = dept.CODE_ID AND dept.GROUP_ID = 'DEP' LEFT JOIN BANK_CODES bank ON m.BANK_CODE = bank.CODE LEFT JOIN COMMON_CODE grade ON m.GRADE_ID = grade.CODE_ID AND grade.GROUP_ID = 'RANK' WHERE m.MEMBER_ID = #{id}
SELECT * FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{id} AND PASSWD = #{passwd}
